blogPost.title: How will workplace culture change with the future of work? Answer by @JordanPeace, CEO and Co-Founder of Fringe. https://t.co/NKIKIXHnXK https://t.co/sSGHNLcldV
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 随着未来工作的发展，职场文化将如何变化？由边缘地带CEO兼联合创始人@JordanPeace回答。https://t.co/NKIKIXHnXK https://t.co/sSGHNLcldV。
隨着未來工作的發展，職場文化將如何變化？由邊緣地帶CEO兼聯合創始人@JordanPeace回答。https://t.co/NKIKIXHnXK https://t.co/sSGHNLcldV。

previous.title: Is venture capital the best way to raise money for a small business? Answer by @DavidHart, Co-Founder & COO @screencloud. https://t.co/B9VmmWBGYB https://t.co/LnFn4m5Omt

localize.full_text: 风险投资是为小企业筹集资金的最佳方式吗？由@大卫-哈特（DavidHart），联合创始人&amp；首席运营官@screencloud回答。https://t.co/B9VmmWBGYB https://t.co/LnFn4m5Omt。
風險投資是爲小企業籌集資金的最佳方式嗎？由@大衛-哈特（DavidHart），聯合創始人&amp；首席運營官@screencloud回答。https://t.co/B9VmmWBGYB https://t.co/LnFn4m5Omt。

next.title: How will the Covid-19 vaccine be distributed in America? Does a protocol exist, or is that also under development? Answer by @mmaghsoodnia, CEO @1healthio. https://t.co/F0tI0V3Yfl https://t.co/epIgGP2DYd

localize.full_text: Covid-19疫苗在美国如何分配？是否有协议，或者也在开发中？由@1healthio首席执行官mmaghsoodnia回答。https://t.co/F0tI0V3Yfl。
